orderId.description: The unique identifier of the order.

sku.description: Somewhat human-friendly code for this item (stock keeping unit). Note that SKUs are reusable while item IDs are internal and unique.

description.description: Description of the item unique to this order. For commissions, use this field for customer specifications.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of this line item.

itemType.description: Indicates the type of this line item

timestamp.description: The date and time when the order was amended, in ISO 8601 format.
